constexpr operator element_type*();

{{dcl|num=2|since=libfund_ts_2|1=

Provides implicit conversions to {{c|element_type*}} and {{c|const element_type*}}.

@1@ This function does not participate in overload resolution unless {{tt|T}} is an object pointer type or is implicitly convertible to {{c|element_type*}}.

@2@ This function does not participate in overload resolution unless {{tt|T}} is an object pointer type or is implicitly convertible to {{c|const element_type*}}.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
A pointer to the object pointed to by the wrapped pointer-like object, i.e., {{c|this-&gt;get()}}.
